name: Trump Goggles
description: See the world like Trump does.

content_scripts._comment: IMPORTANT: Order is critical! The scripts must be loaded in this exact order to ensure proper dependency resolution: logger.js provides logging functionality, error-handler.js provides error handling, browser-detect.js detects browser environment, browser-adapter.js provides cross-browser compatibility, trump-mappings.js provides the mappings, dom-processor.js and text-processor.js provide the processing functionality, mutation-observer.js provides the observer functionality, tooltip-browser-adapter.js provides tooltip-specific browser compatibility, and content-consolidated.js uses all of them.
